sentences.sContent: A country spread-eagles Asia and Europe —that is Turkey.
sentences.sContent_eng: A country spread-eagles Asia and Europe —that is Turkey.
sentences.sCn: 一个横跨欧亚大陆的国家，这就是土耳其。

sentences.sContent: One of the members of the Ulas family, from Turkey, some of whom walk on all fours.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of the members of the Ulas family, from Turkey, some of whom walk on all fours.
sentences.sCn: 乌纳塔恩家族的一名成员，来自土耳其，他们中的一些人四肢着地走路。

sentences.sContent: Turkey, Egypt and Mexico want to go beyond imagining.
sentences.sContent_eng: Turkey, Egypt and Mexico want to go beyond imagining.
sentences.sCn: 土耳其、埃及和墨西哥希望超越梦想。

phrases.pCn: 突然完全停止使用毒品

trans.tranCn: 土耳其（横跨欧亚两洲的国家）
